mapper.select: SELECT sum(case when status = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as active_member, ,sum(case when status = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as stoped_member, ,sum(case when status = 5 then 1 else 0 end) as blocked_member, ,sum(case when status = 1 and created_at >= DATE_ADD(curdate(), interval -7 day) then 1 else 0 end ) as new_member, ,count(*) as total_member FROM member;
